text: Reginaldo Figueira de Faria (born 11 June 1937) is a Brazilian actor and movie director. He has appeared in more than 60 movies and television shows since 1952. He is known for his roles in For√ßa de um Desejo and in O Clone. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian movie directors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro Category:People from Nova Friburgo
title: Reginaldo Faria
